Image 28 of 28 Music stars behaving badly 1 / 28 Back to Gallery Janet Jackson just came back in a big way with a No. 1 album . Justin Bieber and Texas-born Demi Lovato look to soon do the same .
They share something else in common. They've all aroused controversy both on and offstage.
Jackson, of course, bared more than the world was ready for during a Super Bowl halftime show. In Houston, no less. And she's just one of many pop stars whose bad behavior has sometimes outshone their talent.
